title: guddidavane balla
sahitya:
guddidavane balla guddisi koNDavane balla


caraNam 1    jIvadorase konda havaNisi nevasada nungida bahu bhASeya kaDida shiva shiva tAnAge birida
    caraNam 2    Arige moreyiDali piridabhimAnakke saDali bhAravu tirugirali kAraNa idirali irali
    caraNam 3    karmavu chEdisida vairake guriyane mADida dharmava bhAvisida purandara viTTalane nijabuddha
